channel.title: MSSQL Extension on Sujith Quintelier
channel.description: Recent content in MSSQL Extension on Sujith Quintelier

item.title: azure: [Launched] Generally Available: Azure SQL updates for late-February 2026
item.description:
Late-February 2026 Azure SQL updates add a database object search feature to the MSSQL extension for Visual Studio Code.

  • Source: Azure Updates

item.title: azure: [In preview] Public Preview: Azure SQL updates for late-February 2026
item.description:
Late-February 2026 preview updates for Azure SQL add in-dialog database management actions and introduce flat-file import support in the MSSQL extension.

  • Source: Azure Updates

item.title: azure: [In preview] Public Preview: Azure SQL updates for November 2025
item.description:
Public preview announced in November 2025: the MSSQL extension for Visual Studio Code adds an interactive Edit Data interface that lets you view, modify, and insert table rows without manually writing T-SQL, improving data editing workflows for Azure SQL.

  • Source: Azure Updates

item.title: azure: [Launched] Generally Available: Azure SQL updates for late-August 2025
item.description:
Azure SQL and SQL Server received updates in late August 2025, including the general availability of local SQL Server containers via the MSSQL extension for Visual Studio Code.

  • Source: Azure Updates
